original_text: I urged Titus to go, and sent the brother with him. Did Titus take advantage of you? Did we not act in the same spirit? Did we not take the same steps?
korean_text: 내가 디도를 권하고 함께 한 형제를 보내었으니 디도가 너희의 이득을 취하더냐 우리가 동일한 성령으로 행하지 아니하더냐 동일한 보조로 하지 아니하더냐

sentences.original_text: and sent the brother with him.
Did Titus take advantage of you?
Did we not act in the same spirit?
Did we not take the same steps?
